title: [Vornavian Coast, North Beach]
description: The black dunes grow larger to the north, obscuring the view of the coastline.  To the south, smaller dunes support struggling grasses.  A huge, pillar-shaped boulder rises from the beach near the cliffs here.  The boulder is broken near the base and leans against the cliff face.

The black dunes grow larger to the north, obscuring the view of the coastline.  To the south, smaller dunes support struggling grasses.  A huge, pillar-shaped boulder rises from the beach near the cliffs here.  The boulder is broken near the base and leans against the cliff face, providing a bit of cool shade on the otherwise sun-scorched beach.
